Name: Cloud 9
Ingredients: 15 ml Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: A trio of flavours (tequila, aromatised wine and gentian liqueur) come together in a bitter and dry aperitif.
History: Adapted from a recipe created by Jeremy Oertel at Mayahuel in Manhattan, New York City.
Nutrition: One serving of Cloud 9 contains 189 calories
